name: Monster Hunter Generations: Demo
synopsis: The hunt is about to begin in the world of Monster Hunter! Take up the role of a hunter, seeking out and vanquishing a variety of colossal creatures. Or, for the first time, choose to fight as a Felyne in Prowler mode and see the world through their little furry eyes! - Customise your unique hunting style, weapon type and choose from an array of devastating Hunter Arts for NEW powerful moves in battle. - Hunt alone offline or with your fellow hunters, whether as a Hunter or Prowler, through local and online co-operative multiplayer! Happy Hunting! Supports 4 Players online and 4 Players via Local Play
